data.text: Really cool, and very, very smart guys.

data.text: - Dad, do you like my crown?

data.text: And she's pretty heavy like a real baby.

translation.text: Và cô ấy khá nặng như một đứa trẻ thực sự.

data.text: What do you think she needs?

data.text: so, that's what we're gonna do.

data.text: - Did you have a good birthday?

Yêu em sinh nhật cô gái.
